amarikankarayo onna eka una, mama unne chinnu eka weyi kiyala,kochchara unath un ape yaluwo ne, podi hapi mewuwa ekak una,ithali karayo 8 wela padakkam list eke,,kochchara unath api mona hari deyak kara ganne mun hinda ne,mama aththatama sathutu una mun padakkamak gannakota.aaye awurudu 4n olimpik yanawa brasilayata,dan idalama lasthi wenna oona,,brasilaya kiyanne engalanthe wageda,,mama hithanne olimpik ithihase seksima olimpik ulela karayi un,katath aragena tharaga balanna weyi, ane labana sarewath ape raten mita wada deyak labewa kiyala pathanawa,niladhari lod eka giyath padakkamak gaththoth eeka shep,ara kohenda aprikanu ratakin kridakayo 2yi ,niladhari 2yi giye un dennama padakkam 2k aran gihin,ape unta duwanna ba kiyamu, kohoma hari oya hamudawen hari punuruththapana kotingen hari ilakketa wedi thiyanna puluwan ekek hoyala hari brasilayata yawanna mahinda mamata hithewa kiyala mama dan olimpik awasan uthsawaya balanawa,,appe eekath balannama uthsawayak,ee tharamata lassanayi.(spayis kelloth sindu kiyanawa un naki wenne nada manda)

hitapu janadhipathini chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga mahathmiya shri lanka nidahas pakshaye aththanagalla aasana sanwidhayaka lesa path kara thibe.me athara mahindananda aluthgamage mahatha nawalapitiya aasana sanwidhayaka dhurayenda, kumara welgama mahatha mathugama aasana sanwidhayaka dhurayenda iwathkara thibe.mathugama nawa aasana sanwidhayakawariya lesa hitapu amathini sumithra priyangani abedhira mahathmiya saha nawalapitiya nawa sanwidhayaka lesa madhyama palath sabha manthri ech ee ranasinha mahatha path kara thibe.janapathi maithripala sirisena mahatha wisin mema pathwim sidukara thibe.

surakshithabhawa adhikshana karthawya itukirimata rajayata athi hakiyawa wadi diyunu karanu was jathyayanthara siwil guwan sewa sanwidhanaya wisin sidukala nirdeshayakata prathichara lesa, 2002 wasaredi rajaya siwil guwansewa departhamenthuwa ahosi kara 2002 anka 34 darana shri lanka siwil guwansewa adhikariya panatha prakarawa shri lanka siwil guwansewa adhikariya pihituwana ladi. 1950 anka 15 darana guwan sankarana panatha wenuwata 2010 anka 14 darana siwil guwan sewa panatha handunwa denu labu athara warthamana awashyathawayanta sarilana paridi siwil guwan sewa katayuthu paripalanaya kirima sandaha pulul prathipadana athi karana ladi.

mona tharam yahapathwa ya haki ratak, mona tharam eladayi wiya haki ratak, gaurawaniya wiya hakiwa thibu ratak, aarthika samruddhiya labiya haki ratak, sahajiwanayak ekka gatha kala haki ratak, jathyantharaya dinagatha haki awasthawak me wage khedawachakayata path wi aththe, rata arajika wi aththe badumkaraya nisayi.
ese wuwath, jathyayanthara yana wachanaye arutha jathin athara yanna nisa, me jathyayantharayata yama yanu niwaradi yedumak nowana bawa bhasha wisharadayin ge mathayayi.
mema naduwe withthikaruwan lesa namkara thibu thawath pudgalayin 8 deneku mita pera adhikaranaya hamuwe warada piligena naduwa awasan kara gena thibe.
samagiye aadarshaya ape bhikshu samajayatath athishayin wadagath kiyalayi mama hithanne.

giya sathiyedi kolambaa nagaraye ek dinakadi sidu kala watalimakin horata kirum minum sidu kala welendun this denakuta nadu pawara thibe.anumathiya laba mudra thabu tharadi padi bhawitha kala yuthu wuwath wadi pirisak santhakaye thibi aththe piligath tharadi padi nowe.kolambaa manin welendasala, narahenpita, boralla dematagoda, dehiwala athulu pradesha rasakin horata kirana welendun pilibanda paminili labi thibuni.mewani siduwim gana paminili lada sanin kriyathmaka wana bawa minum eekaka pramithi ha sewa departhamenthuwe pradhana karyalaye karya bhara niladhari mba.di. premasiri mahatha “siluminata” kiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
